author: Jillian Stampher
title: Photo: At least 1 person hurt after small plane crashes in Bally, Pa., officials say - @NBCPhiladelphia
text: Privacy Policy | More Newsletters At least one person was hurt after a small plane crashed into a field in Berks County Monday night. The small aircraft made a crash landing in a field near the 400 block of South 7th Street in Bally Borough. At least one person was hurt in the crash and taken to the hospital. Officials have not yet revealed his or her condition. This story is developing. Check back for updates. Published 2 hours ago
